scripts.start:all: concurrently -n "agency,auth,client,listing,offer,search" -c "bgBlue,bgMagenta,bgCyan,bgGreen,bgYellow,bgRed" "npm start --prefix agency-service" "npm start --prefix auth-service" "npm start --prefix client-service" "npm start --prefix listing-service" "npm start --prefix offer-service" "npm run dev --prefix search-service"
